des: "White chocolate and sparkle-y sprinkles on Pretzel CrispsÂ® make festive party snacks."
ins:
Microwave white chocolate chips in a microwave safe bowl until beginning to melt. Stir. Microwave another few seconds until completely melted.
Dip different parts of Original Pretzel CrispsÂ® into the chocolate. Coat with gold sprinkles or white sugar pearls and set aside to cool and harden. Enjoy!
